org.hkijena.jipipe.ui.components.layouts

Class ModifiedFlowLayout

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.FlowLayout
      • org.hkijena.jipipe.ui.components.layouts.ModifiedFlowLayout
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LayoutManager, Serializable

    public class ModifiedFlowLayout
extends FlowLayout
    A modified version of FlowLayout that allows containers using this Layout to behave in a reasonable manner when placed inside a JScrollPane
    Author:
    Babu Kalakrishnan Modifications by greearb and jzd
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
